content: The number of people involved in putting on a Depeche Mode show can vary depending on the size and complexity of the show. Generally, a major concert can involve hundreds of people, including the band and their crew, the production team, lighting and sound engineers, stage technicians, security personnel, and catering staff. The scale of the show also determines how many people are needed to handle the logistics of the event, such as ticketing, transportation, and accommodation. A Depeche Mode show typically involves a large team of people who work together to create a seamless and unforgettable experience for the audience.
